metadata.title: Historical Transportation Routes

creators.name: USDA Forest Service, Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Support Services-Land Records Information Section

metadata.description: Data Type: Infrastructure ;  This statewide database depicts historical use trails that qualify as potential right-of-ways under the Federal Revised Statute 2477. This data reflects an extensive land ownership search of over 1200 historical trails evaluating each trail according to regulations of RS 2477. The intended use of this dataset is to provide a tool for the state's use to meet public access needs.
metadata.notes:

Use constraints: DNR does not recommend use of this data at a larger scale. Greater detail for each layer is provided from DNR, Land Records Information Section, for each data module upon receipt of order.
